participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and resourceful, Alex thrives on new experiences and loves the outdoors.
participant_1.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker. i'm also a graduate student.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nostalgic, Emily has a passion for dance and enjoys reminiscing about her childhood.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80s. i love new kids on the block.

content.text: yeah that is smart i do a lot of kayaking
